name: Deep Space Horizons
description:
Embarking on a mission to sustain your space station, you crash land on a mysterious and foreign planet. Accompanied by your AI in your helmet, you will explore this atmospheric landscape to recover resources, repair your ship, and return home to complete your mission! 

As you explore, it starts to make you wonder...what exactly are these creatures you are collecting? Why do they seem so...familiar?

A project by Dream Team for The Women in Games Jam 2021 with the theme Atmosphere

Controls
  • A/D left and right
  • Space to jump
  • E to interact with objects
  • Hold left click to fire blaster
  • ESC for options
The Team

Nyla Laurie - UI Artist and Background Artist

Kai Haughton - Character Artist and Programmer

Luca Xavier- Narrative Designer

Birdobean - Composer and VFX Designer

Leo Burns - Programmer

Patches
  • 1.1 Dialogue Adjusted
